sections.title: Justiciar (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Justiciar class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Justiciar)
sections.description: Justiciars gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Aura of Law (Ex) (Justiciar)
sections.description: The justiciar radiates an aura of law detectable by detect law spells, with power equal to character level or character level +4 if she has cleric or paladin levels.

sections.title: Authority (Su) (Justiciar)
sections.description: The justiciar has legal authority to enforce her code, gains +4 bonus on Diplomacy and Intimidate checks regarding law and authority, has perfect knowledge of her legal code, and can always take 10 on Knowledge checks about the code.

sections.title: Lawkeeper (Justiciar)
sections.description: Justiciars cannot violate their code or willingly agreed oaths and contracts, losing all class abilities if they do so until receiving atonement or official pardon.

sections.title: Sure Shot (Justiciar)
sections.description: The justiciar can add her Charisma bonus to crossbow attack rolls and deal 1 extra damage per justiciar level, usable a number of times per day equal to class level.

sections.title: Oathmark (Su) (Justiciar)
sections.description: The justiciar can magically link two willing creatures in an agreement, marking oathbreakers with a physical curse that penalizes Diplomacy checks and alerting the other party of betrayal.
